JobFullDesc: Join a movement in which everyone can win. We started a movement in which everyone can win – shoppers, retailers, society and every person on our team. To play fair, trust people and reward them for doing the right thing. We see and feel the impact of our work as more and more people gain financial freedom and retailers grow across the globe.Clearpay EU is part of the Afterpay Limited Family. Founded five years ago in Sydney, Australia, Afterpay and Clearpay have millions of active customers globally and are offered by the best retailers around the world including Boohoo, ASOS, Marks & Spencer, JD Sports and many others. Afterpay is on a mission to power an economy in which everyone wins.Afterpay is completely free for customers who pay on time – helping people spend responsibly without incurring interest, fees or extended debt. Afterpay empowers customers to access the things they want and need, while still allowing them to maintain financial wellness and control, by splitting payments in four, for both online and in-store purchases. Afterpay is deeply committed to delivering positive outcomes for customers. We are focused on supporting our community of shoppers.We trust in the next generation and share a vision of a more accessible and sustainable world in which people are rewarded for doing the right thing.The OpportunityAs Clearpay’s Senior Product Manager - Payments Enablement, you’ll be responsible for the day to day operation of Clearpay’s card payment processes and have a global initiative focus, working with a global team of Payments Product Managers.We are much more than our job descriptions, but here’s where you will begin….·       Support new market entry through enabling payments capability·       Work cross-functionally with our Product, Finance, Customer Service and OPs, merchant services, design, analytics and engineering teams globally to drive value for consumers, merchants and Afterpay·       Work with external partners and internal teams to ensure compliance with scheme and regulatory requirementsWork with external partners and internal teams to ensure compliance with global and local scheme and regulatory requirements·       Understand the customer experience from end-to-end, collecting data and creating tests to show the value behind product ideas·       Lead a team of engineers and designers to deliver intuitive and exciting experiences·       Partner with our product teams to unlock value for all partners in our ecosystem·       Manage operational issues which impact customers or profitabilityWho are you?Like us, you’ll be deeply committed to delivering positive outcomes for customers and passionate about shaping the future of Afterpay.Working in a challenging, vibrant and fast-paced environment, you’ll need drive, resilience and versatility. A respectful attitude and the ability to build good relationships is vital.  We are looking for a talented and dedicated professional with the following characteristics and ethics: ·       Solid scheme payments product management experience in multiple markets·       Have a desire to work with a global team on global initiatives·       Operational-level understanding of card acquiring and experience working with the front-line on payments issues·       Knows enough to not need to look up 840, 100 or what the ‘E’ in EMV is·       Ability to be a sharp, rigorous thinker who can operate successfully among very bright, progressive and charismatic people.·       Must be an energetic, transparent and engaging individual with a natural skill for developing relationships both internally and externallySkills and Attributes·       Ability to understand and think strategically and implement long term plans; can handle both long term and short term goals simultaneously·       Able to work in fast paced and pressured environments and on multiple things at any one time and be comfortable with context switching·       Able to problem solve and innovatively work your way around roadblocks·       Self-motivated, well-presented, disciplined and methodical·       Strong verbal and written communications and interpersonal skills that inspire trust·       Maintaining enthusiasm and calm demeanor in even the most stressful situations·       Must be able to add value with a strong team focus How we reward you. We have a pay-for-performance culture so you can expect to be rewarded for high performance. We pride ourselves on fairness and offer a competitive total reward package made up of salary, incentives and benefits.We have a strong focus on health and wellbeing at Afterpay as we aim to support you to succeed in both your career and personal lives, such as providing employees with a corporate membership to Headspace, gym membership and language lessons options. We also offer a range of medical benefits such as private medical insurance.We value diversity and a collaborative and inclusive environment where everyone feels they belong is important to us.How to Apply: We don’t know what the future holds. That’s the exciting part; we show up and make it happen. If you’re brave, if you’re committed to doing the right thing and excited by this opportunity, click apply now!Afterpay is continuing to hire for all open roles with all interviewing and on-boarding done virtually due to COVID-19. All new team members, in addition to current staff, will temporarily work from home until it is safe to return to our offices. Please submit you resume in English
